A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The previous Star Wars entry\, The Force Awakens\, was criticized by individuals like myself for following too closely in the foot prints of the likes of Episode IV: A New Hope. In making Episode VIII directors\, writers\, and producers have made an effort to strike out on their own with a new story.\n\nHaving done so I can clearly see why the first film in the new trilogy stuck so closely to the formula from the past. There is no substance here just a visual extravaganza filled with sound and fury\, signifying nothing...
